snippet.title: Bioshock Remastered Intro in 60 FPS - Welcome to Rapture
snippet.description:
This is a gameplay video of the legendary game created by the Irrational Games team, Bioshock (the remastered edition which just came out for free on steam for the user who already had the game). This is how the game looks at 1080p in 60 FPS (Frames Per Second) on my GTX 765m. I chose to show the intro part because it's one of the most icon intros in video game industry to date. The game is available on PC/XBONE & PS4.
If you haven't played the game yet, play the original version, this is a pretty poor port, some lighting issues, missing video settings etc. 

Links:
✘Twitter: https://twitter.com/akndude
✘Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/id/aknsource

TIMESTAMPS:
0:00 You were born to do great things
0:52 Always a lighthouse
2:17 No Gods or Kings. Only Man.
2:47 Andrew Ryan: Welcome to Rapture
5:27 Is it someone new
6:40 Atlas
7:40 Wrench
8:14 What the doctor ordered
9:22 Big Daddy & Little Sister
10:06 Gameplay

✘Subscribe: https://youtube.com/c/AkNyt?sub_confirmation=1

---
Bonus video: 
►bad company 2 and bioshock intros are similar → https://youtu.be/wxzDcFauJEo
